2164.subject: SL
2164.descrlong:
This course prepares students to design and lead service learning experiences.  Students will explore experiential education and community-based learning; theories pertinent to service, social justice, and service learning; and critical reflection and dialogue facilitation.  Students simultaneously engage in a practical experience in the community, which strengthens their capacity to be reflective practitioners. (Offered fall semester.)

(Prereq: Junior or Senior Standing)
